I am a Machine Learning Engineer who loves building projects that bring AI into the real world.

I currently work in the AI team at [Tambua Health](https://www.tambuahealth.com/).

I also love contributing to Open Source Software. 

In this blog, I write technical posts about interesting topics I encounter along the way, and also personal blog posts about my thoughts.

Welcome to my digital garden.
